name: color-operation
description: Enumeration defining the various color operations for lighting control.

values.name: fade-to-cct
values.description: Fade to a specific correlated color temperature (CCT).

values.name: ramp-to-cct
values.description: Ramp to a specific correlated color temperature (CCT).

values.name: step-up-cct
values.description: Step up the correlated color temperature (CCT).

values.name: step-down-cct
values.description: Step down the correlated color temperature (CCT).
